Generic modification API
[INS: Instruction Object]


Functions

BOOL LEVEL_PINCLIENT::INS_ChangeMemOpToBaseRegisterAddressMode (INS ins, MEMORY_TYPE mtype, REG newBase)

Detailed Description

Use these functions to modify instructions. They work for all instruction sets. For experts only!

Change this memory access instruction use a base register addressing mode On ia32, it will not rewrite references using esp/rsp
